content: I think I'll go with the 80/20 Ground Chuck. I've had good experiences with that ratio in the past. By the way, speaking of past experiences, I think it was three weekends ago when I finally got around to cleaning my grill, which had been sitting idle in the backyard for months. It was a messy job, but I got it done and even seasoned the grates to get them ready for the next cookout.
